name: Freefalll
description:
Welcome to my entry for My First Game Jam!

My game is called Freefalll (one 'l' for each square)

Use the arrow keys to control to barriers at the bottom of the screen

Let the blue squares fall through and block the red squares

But be careful, every time you make a mistake, you lose a square

The game ends after one minute or when you run out of squares

Have Fun!

(My record is 132)
